title: Really Riot, ANOTHER Baron change?
body:
https://65.media.tumblr.com/7102e18537ce939a52882a3bf5091529/tumblr_nu02gdM80U1r6kzduo1_500.png

Though I will admit this Baron is......rather horrifying.

Edit: And no this is not real.

replies.body:
QUICK PYRRHA KILL I-

too soon. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
http://orig13.deviantart.net/8374/f/2016/163/f/c/rwby_chibi_episode_6_meme__by_wcher999-da6137p.jpg
The subtitles in that one were fantastic.
Dont worry, Yang is there to land a hand. But only **a** hand
https://i.imgflip.com/11b797.jpg
Is RWBY really a popular anime?

is it popular? yes. is it good? somewhat. is it long? no, but i keep telling my ex that size doesnt matter when you love someone... she never listens.

it's made with this weird 3D animation software that's really crappy and used to create XXX-rated video game simulations and is endorsed or something like that by rooster teeth - the people who also had a hand in red vs blue the halo slapstick sitcom thing.

however the voice acting is great and it really is funny if you like sub par humor like i do. the first season only has 15 minute long episodes unfortunately though. some are even just 5 minutes long. i guess they didnt think it'd be popular like it actually is.

the characters are highschool aged though so if teen drama bores you and you werent a fan of soap operas to begin with... it might not be for you.


*EDIT* OH OH OH and one of the original artists or something died during the productions. that might be something that caused it to have issues at one point as well.
pretty sure monty was the original creator of RWBY not just an artist. good try though

I know about Roosterteeth, theyre my favorite media production company, Is just that I don't watch thir animated series cause theyre sometimes cringy lol.

Yeah, Monty, RIP, but I don't think it caused issues. I just want to know why people here like it so much and if they'd recommend it, apparently you kinda do.

Oh no you called it an anime.

It was nice knowing you.

(And yes it is popular)
I mean, even Miles cales it an anime. I've never watch it cause I expected at least the first season to be subpar, but people here love it lol

The first season is good and it gets better. The graphics arnt the best in vol 1 and the trailers but vol 2 and 3 really pick that up. The characters are very memorable. A lot of people dont refer to it as an Anime because most people have the idea Anime can only be from Japan.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/20b5e4944f94ec0d40012e0b2c29a0eb/tumblr_o2gt3bIEsY1sj032xo1_500.gif

3 many disarmed puns 5 me
http://65.media.tumblr.com/d0795df0d4dd0bddab43d4c0eca76eb5/tumblr_o0r1k8FsHk1tc9ajso1_1280.jpg
Where's Jaune when you need a distraction
dont worry RWBY is here to save the day
It's RUBY... Damn it
He could be referring to the whole team.

THE WHOLE TEAM ISN'T IN THE PHOTO THOUGH

AND SINCE VOLUME 3 THE (this segment has been censored by the people's republic of china)
Team RNJR for the win, you know it.

I swear if N + R doesn't become open this season... Or better yet if one of them is removed to the show...

**WE RIOT**
Something tells me that all of team JNPR is going to die.  It's only a matter of time.  And that Ruby is gonna watch each one go.
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-36910-no-god-please-no-gif-Michael-S-hIu3.gif
Quiet, clown. You're drunk.
I ain't Tidal Terror though
Eh, same difference. You're both crazy.

*triggered... Pulls out Laser Cannon*

You what... Ninja?

*Pulls out mirror shield*

Just try it, clown.

*triggered*

I... Don't... Main... SHACO ANYMORE YOU BASTARD

*Switches for Lightsaber*

**DIE**

*Cuts mirror in half then impales*

*Dodge Zone winds down*

Looks like you missed. My turn.

*Slices spirit into pieces*

Just dont let Nora get near that thing

http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/249/d/9/rwby_broken_by_dinochickrox-d6lbhei.jpg

Pish, Baron is barely larger than a Nevermore.
Though defs more dangerous.
What about the Dragon tho :P
Elder Dragon is propably about the same size.

im not talkin Elder Dragon

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby/images/7/7e/Infobox_Dragon.png/revision/latest?cb=20160131160016

its pretty big
umm.... why is She smaller than annie... that's like a minion vs. Baron lol.
Ruby seems to be in a **grimm** situation

Maybe Yang should give her a hand.

I don't think Penny's quite up for the job, though.  She kinda fell to pieces in the middle of a fight last season.

Oh!  Maybe you should grab Pyrrah to help!  That girl has been on fire lately.
http://i.imgur.com/bCzE0ke.jpg?noredirect
I still feel sad when I think of what happened to Penny.  She had really started to grow on me.

Pyrrha knows how to magically make money

After all, she turned a Penny into Quarters
This needs to actually become a thing.

You think THAT's bad?

http://i.imgur.com/OdnBEEz.jpg

I remember the dark days...
Did i miss something why is baron white and purple now?
Its a recreation of baron as if it was a Grimm from the show RWBY. it is nothing official.
Who's the new champ there?
Ruby, The Silver-Eyed Huntress
Nice.  Any idea what role and powers she has?

I'm not sure if you're joking or not, but if you aren't, that's Ruby Rose from "RWBY" facing Baron changed to look like one of the monsters of Grimm from the show.  Entire show's on YouTube and new season comes out at the end of August.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYW2GmHB5xs

No, I do know the series and was having fun thinking what she would be like as a league champ

Probably should have put a note earlier to avoid this outcome.
